title: On Second Thought, Vikings Put Adrian Peterson On Exempt List
teaser: The Minnesota Vikings announced on Thursday that they will place star running back Adrian Peterson on the exempt list until his legal troubles are resolved. Peterson was indicted by a grand jury for reckless and negligent injury to a child after whipping his son with a switch.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
